records.QueryText: Regarding calcium boron spray?
records.KccAns: Two to three sprays of Ca and boron is required in fruits for maintenance of firmness. Even after its availability in the soil it is not available to the apple fruits in appropriate quantities because of its very slow mobility. The ideal time of Ca and boron sprays in apple is right from Pea size to 30-45 days prior to harvesting of fruits. It should be in the form of Calcium chloride(Dehydrated)@3-5 g per ltr of water along with boric acid @ 1.5 g per ltr of water.Mixing calcium chloride with commercial fungicide formulations results in very slow penetration of calcium into apple fruits so don,t mix calcium with fungicides.

records.QueryText: nutrient management in mentha
records.KccAns: Dear farmer spray NPK-19:19:19 @1.5 kg/acre with 150-200  liter of water.

records.QueryText: Asked about  spacing and bulb treatment in tuberose.
records.KccAns:
Spacing:- 30 x 20 cm
Bulb treatment:-The bulbs are first thoroughly cleaned and treated with Bavistin (0.2%) for 30 minutes. . Dry in shade before planting or storing.

records.QueryText: Spray schedule in apple at petal fall stage?
records.KccAns: When  60-70 % petal fall occurs Spray Difenaconazole 25EC   (30 ml)  or Flusilazole  40 EC   (20 ml) or Trifloxystrobin  25% +  Tebuconazole 50%   75 WG  (40 g)  in 100 ltrs of water. Adjuvants/Stickers may be added for better efficacy of fungicides especially during rainy days. Sticker like Sandovit @ 50-75 ml/100 lit. of suspension should be used.Stickers should not be used with Dodine.Do not mix any other micro nutrient/growth regulator/hormone with the above recommended pesticides to avoid russeting and other disorders. In case there is necessity, these chemicals to be sprayed separately.

records.QueryText: How to control flower and fruit dropping ?
records.KccAns: Spray of planofix @ 1 ml/ 4.5 liter water .

records.QueryText: Information regarding control of Termite or shoot borer in Sugarcane?
records.KccAns:
For control of Termite or shoot borer in Sugarcane is Broadcaste 10kg Regent 0.3(fipronil) or Padan 4G(cartap hydrochloride) mixed in 20kg sand.
AND SPRAY CHLORPYRIFOS 20 EC 1LTR/ ACRE MIX  200 LTR WATER OR CORAZEN 150 ML / ACRE MIX 400 LTR WATER

records.QueryText: fruit dropping problem
records.KccAns: Spray planofix (Naphthalene Acetic Acid) 1 ML in 4-5 lit of water.

records.QueryText: Provide information about pest management and disease management in black gram crops ?
records.KccAns: Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63% W.P 400 gm per acre and Imidacloprid 17.8% S.L 100 ml per acre medicines in 200 liters of water in the cultivator's black gram crop.

records.QueryText: Asking about thrips in cotton
